alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 10:06PM CDT until June 11 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR CHICKASAW...SOUTHEASTERN CALHOUN AND WESTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 1005 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trebloc, or 9 miles southeast of Houston, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Houston, Okolona, Prairie, New Wren, Trebloc, Hatley, Woodland, Sparta, Binford, Becker, Van Vleet, Egypt, Wren, Strong, Tabbville, McCondy, Anchor and Atlanta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
